question: The "San Alfonso del Mar", the second-largest swimming pool in the world, is located in which nation?
explanation: The San Alfonso del Mar, the second-largest swimming pool in the world, is located in Chile. It is a swimming pool of aÂ  private resort having an area of 860,000 sq.ft. It receives its water from the Pacific Ocean. The largest swimming pool in the world is the "City Stars Sharm El Sheikh" of Egypt.
